description: This table contains information about the comments associated with bundled episodes.

columns.name: EPISODE_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the bundled episode record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Longer billing comments can be broken up into multiple lines of information.

columns.name: BILLING_COMMENT
columns.description: Stores the billing comments for the bundled episode.
